text: I was wondering if i could possible write an app, that could be a list of all my friends and just simply posting a message to their walls on the friends i select.
Not a message, a wall post.
So it appears that i went to their wall and wrote a message, they have no idea that an app is pushing the message to them.
also could it be written in python :) its what i know.
php is so icky, but doable if it is the only option.
